This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9626] It is expected that ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent with a value of 1,067,076,000 reported in the network role http://www.santanderconsumer.com/role/StatementofcomprehensiveincomeOCIcomponentspresentedbeforetaxStatement should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, ComprehensiveIncome with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParentMember and a reported value of 1,133,367,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.santanderconsumer.com/role/StatementofchangesinequityStatement. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent fact are:
Period : 2019-01-01 to 2019-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent : -3 Decimals of ComprehensiveIncome : -3 Rule version: 17.0.0 - https://filings.xbrl.org/5493000LM0MZ4JPMGM90/2020-12-31/ESEF/ES/0/5493000LM0MZ4JPMGM90-20201231.zip/5493000LM0MZ4JPMGM90-20201231/reports/5493000LM0MZ4JPMGM90-20201231.xhtml 14700
